name: LD48 - Ore Hoarder
description:
Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48, using Game Maker Studio 2.

The theme was "Deeper and deeper". I hated the theme at first, but once I settled on an idea I was completely motivated all the way through.

There are a lot of small changes I wish I had time to make before the competition ended, but over all I am really satisfied with what I managed to accomplish in 2 days.

Directions:

You are a robot. Dig deep, collect and sell ore, and upgrade yourself until you can reach a depth of 300 meters to win the game.

Controls:

[W] - Fly

[A]. [S] - Drive left/right, and drill sideways.

[D] - Drill downwards

[E] - Interact
